name: Marvin Lopez

marvinl803/narwhals.summary: Recent activities include multiple push events that added new features such as pyarrow-stubs, improved error messages for unsupported group-by aggregations, and bumped the version to 1.19.0. Additional commits include enhancements to read_parquet, scan_parquet, and improvements to DataFrame and Series docstrings.

narwhals-dev/narwhals.summary: Recent activities include two pull requests: one for adding tests for not-so-old-versions, pretty-old-versions, and nightlies; and another for adding utility functions to narwhals/dependencies, including is_narwhals_dataframe, is_narwhals_lazyframe, and is_narwhals_series, along with test cases.

marvinl803/youtube.summary: Recent activities include two push events: one added an autoplay message in English and another added a feature to filter videos under 2 minutes, along with a merge from the code-charity:master branch.

code-charity/youtube.summary: Recent activity includes a pull request that added support for an English autoplay message, previously only available in Spanish, with before and after visual comparisons provided.

profile_summary: I'm Marvin Lopez, a detail-oriented developer with a strong foundation in HTML and CSS, actively building and maintaining a portfolio of 16 public repositories. With a focus on creating robust and scalable solutions, I continue to expand my skill set and contribute to the developer community. As I grow my professional network, I'm excited to collaborate and learn from like-minded individuals and share my own experiences and expertise.
